hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export PATH=$PATH:/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/update-infer/infer/bin/
umask 0022
rm -rf $(find . -name "*.OBJ") if test ! -d nspr; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/projects/nspr else cd nspr && hg pull -u && cd - fi if test ! -d nss; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/projects/nss else cd nss && hg pull -u && cd - fi
cd nss make nss_clean_all USE_64=1 infer --keep-going -o ${JOB_NAME}/ -- make nss_build_all
! DIFF_RESULT=`diff -u ${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/${JOB_NAME}/lastSuccessful/archive/nss/${JOB_NAME}/bugs.txt ${JOB_NAME}/bugs.txt` if test -n "$DIFF_RESULT"; then echo "$DIFF_RESULT"|mail -v -s "${JOB_NAME} changes" sylvestre@mozilla.com fkiefer@mozilla.com fi
chmod o+rx $(find nss-infer/ -type d) chmod -R o+r ${JOB_NAME} rsync -arv -R ${JOB_NAME}/ sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/reports/
